aqList.name: How does DETPractice’s plans and pricing work?
aqList.content: We provide transparent plans and pricing for our users, with no hidden fees. Additionally, we offer add-on subscription packages so that you can choose services according to your needs.

aqList.name: Is there a free trial?
aqList.content: Yes! You can view 20 questions for free. Help you understand us before you buy more services.

aqList.name: Do you offer any discounts?
aqList.content: Yes! We offer tailored discounts for each service. However, when you opt for a 30-day service, you'll receive a greater discount compared to other services. Please refer to the price details above for more information.

aqList.name: My payment was successful, but the upgrade failed.
aqList.content: Please contact us via chat or email: support@detpractice.com. This is the simplest and fastest way to address your concerns.

aqList.name: Can I change my plan later?
aqList.content: Thank you for purchasing the service! Please note that this is a virtual product. Once purchased, product delivery is considered complete and is generally non-refundable. Please check before purchasing.

aqList.name: Where do I send my feedback?
aqList.content: You can send feedback through the support chat in the bottom right corner, or contact us via email at support@detpractice.com. Alternatively, you can leave a message directly in the "Contact Us" section.

aqList.name: What is your refund policy?
aqList.content1:
1. Free Account
Usage is entirely free, so there are no refund issues.
aqList.content2:
2. Subscription Plans
Users may request a refund if DET Practice fails to provide the corresponding service, resulting in the user being unable to use it, or if the subscription has not yet taken effect. Refunds will not be issued for subscriptions and services that have already become active after purchase.
aqList.content3:
3. Speaking/Writing Guide
The Speaking/Writing Guide is considered a digital product. Once purchased and downloaded, the product delivery is deemed complete and is generally non-refundable. Please carefully read the purchase information before making a purchase.
aqList.content4:
Important Note:
All refund requests must be processed through customer service, and relevant usage records must be provided for verification.
To prevent fraudulent refunds, each user account is limited to one refund request. Multiple requests will not be processed.
If you have any special circumstances or unique situations, please contact us, and we will work with you to find a resolution.

aboutUs.title: About DET Pratice
aboutUs.oeletdesc: At the heart of our language education services lies a team of dedicated, highly qualified, and experienced educators, each bringing their own unique expertise and passion to the forefront of language learning. Our team is comprised of elite professionals who are not only proficient in English but also experts in preparing students for major English proficiency tests like the TOEFL, IELTS, and Duolingo English Test (DET). Our educators hold prestigious certifications such as TESOL, and Cambridge English Teacher Training certificates, showcasing their commitment to delivering high-quality language education. They possess impressive language test scores, reflecting their deep understanding of the skills and strategies necessary to excel in these exams. The collective experience of our team spans several years, during which they have honed their ability to cater to diverse learning needs. They excel in identifying students’ individual strengths and weaknesses, ensuring personalized teaching approaches that maximize learning outcomes. This unique ability allows them to provide targeted guidance and feedback, helping students break through learning barriers and rapidly improve their language proficiency. Our educators are not just teachers; they are mentors who inspire confidence and enthusiasm in their students. They foster a dynamic and interactive learning environment, making the journey of language learning both enjoyable and effective. Their teaching methods are continuously evolving, integrating innovative techniques and materials to stay abreast of the latest trends in language education. The success of our students in achieving their language goals is a testament to our team’s expertise, dedication, and teaching excellence. As a unit, they represent the best of language education, committed to guiding students toward achieving their highest potential in English proficiency.
aboutUs.p1content1: As the leading figure of our teaching team, Michael Z. embodies the pinnacle of language instruction. With extensive teaching experience that spans over a decade, Mike holds all the credentials of our esteemed teachers, including TESOL, Cambridge English Teacher Training Certificates, and other certificates. His exceptional language proficiency is reflected in his impressive scores: 115 on TOEFL, 8.5 on IELTS, and a perfect 150 on Duolingo English Test. Michael teaching philosophy combines the strengths of our diverse team, offering a comprehensive and dynamic approach to language learning. He is renowned for his ability to deeply understand and address the unique needs of each student, fostering a learning environment where students can thrive and surpass their goals. His classes are a blend of rigorous academic standards and engaging, interactive learning experiences. Beyond teaching, Michael is instrumental in developing cutting-edge curriculum and training methods, ensuring our courses remain at the forefront of language education. His dedication to excellence in teaching and his commitment to student success make him an invaluable leader and mentor both to our team and our students.
aboutUs.p2content1: Scoring 8.5 in IELTS, Albert has extensive experience in teaching IELTS, TOEFL, PTE, and DET. His teaching is known for its relaxed and lively atmosphere, making learning enjoyable. Albert’s approach is tailored to each student’s needs, enabling rapid improvement in English proficiency in a short period. Besides being an excellent teacher, Albert is also a talented course designer who has created and developed various online and offline courses for English learners of different levels and goals. He has a deep understanding of the curriculum standards and assessment criteria of various English tests, and he knows how to design effective and engaging learning activities and materials that can help students master the test skills and strategies. Albert has also collaborated with other teachers and experts to review and improve the quality and relevance of the courses, and he has received positive feedback and recognition from both students and peers. Albert is passionate about creating innovative and personalized courses that can cater to the diverse needs and interests of English learners.
aboutUs.p3content1: With 11 years of teaching experience, Rita is a seasoned expert in Duolingo English Test preparation and research. She is an ATI-certified advanced English teacher, holding a TESOL Advanced English Teacher Certificate and Cambridge English Teacher Training Certificate. Rita has impressive scores of 111 in TOEFL and 140 in DET. Her teaching is marked by an ability to precisely analyze students’ needs and provide targeted instruction, helping them break through barriers and enhance their language skills to achieve their desired scores swiftly. In addition, Rita is a passionate and enthusiastic teacher who always motivates and inspires her students to learn English with confidence and joy. She uses a variety of interactive and engaging methods, such as games, role-plays, debates, and simulations, to make her classes fun and effective. She also gives personalized feedback and guidance to each student, helping them improve their weak areas and overcome their challenges. Rita’s students love her warm and supportive personality, and they often praise her for being patient, friendly, and professional.
aboutUs.p4content1: Doris, scoring 145 in DET and 8.0 in IELTS, is a versatile Duolingo English Test instructor known for her rich teaching experience. She excels in helping students of various levels quickly overcome difficulties to achieve their ideal results, having once helped a student improve by 30 points in just two weeks. Her classes are known for their lively atmosphere and clear logic, and her teaching style is rigorous yet passionate and responsible, making her a favorite among a wide range of students.
aboutUs.p5content1: Laura brings years of experience in Duolingo training, 110 in TOEFL, and 155 in DET. A specialist in Duolingo question research, Laura is adept in teaching adaptive test questions and writing. She has a deep understanding of DET exam techniques and trends, excelling in performance analysis to quickly identify and enhance students’ potential.

cookie.cookie_ex: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding cookies on our website.

q1.title: What are cookies?
q1.a1: Cookies are small pieces of text sent by your web browser by a website you visit. A cookie file is stored in your web browser and allows the website or a third-party to recognize you and make your next visit easier and the website more useful to you.
q1.a2: Cookies can be "persistent" or "session" cookies. Persistent cookies remain on your personal computer or mobile device when you go offline, while session cookies are deleted as soon as you close your web browser.

q2.title: How we use cookie
q2.a1: When you use and access our website, we may place a number of cookies files in your web browser.
q2.a2: We use cookies for the following purposes :
q2.a3: • To enable certain functions of the website
q2.a6: • To enable advertisements delivery (which are cookies from a domain different than the domain of the website you are visiting – for our advertising and marketing efforts.)
q2.a7: We use both session and persistent cookies on our website and we use different types of cookies to run the website:
q2.a8: • Essential cookies: We may use essential cookies to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts.
q2.a9: • Analytical/performance cookies: We may use analytical/performance cookies to track user activity on the website and gather data about how visitors use the website. This information is used to improve the website experience for our users.
q2.a10: • Functionality cookies: We may use functionality cookies to recognize you when you return to the website and personalize content for you.
q2.a11: • Targeting cookies: We may use targeting cookies to record your visit to the website, the pages you have visited, and the links you have followed.

q3.title: Your choices regarding cookies
q3.a1: If you prefer to avoid the use of cookies on our website, you must disable the use of cookies in your browser and then delete the cookies saved in your browser associated with this website. You may use this option for preventing the use of cookies at any time.

q4.title: Contact us
q4.a1: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us :
q4.a3: • By visiting this page on our website:

q5.title: Changes to our Cookie Policy
q5.a1: We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page.
